member.name: M:OpenSlideSharp.OpencvExtensions.AssociatedImageExtensions.ToJpeg(OpenSlideSharp.AssociatedImage,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.param: For JPEG, it can be a quality from 0 to 100 (the higher is the better). Default value is 95.

member.name: M:OpenSlideSharp.OpencvExtensions.AssociatedImageExtensions.ToJpegStream(OpenSlideSharp.AssociatedImage,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.param: For JPEG, it can be a quality from 0 to 100 (the higher is the better). Default value is 95.

member.name: M:OpenSlideSharp.OpencvExtensions.AssociatedImageExtensions.ToPng(OpenSlideSharp.AssociatedImage,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.param: For PNG, it can be the compression level from 0 to 9. A higher value means a smaller size and longer compression time. Default value is 3.

member.name: M:OpenSlideSharp.OpencvExtensions.AssociatedImageExtensions.ToPngStream(OpenSlideSharp.AssociatedImage,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.param: For PNG, it can be the compression level from 0 to 9. A higher value means a smaller size and longer compression time. Default value is 3.
